project.name: ember-cli-debounce-query-params
project.description: Ember CLI addon to update query params with a debounce

Usage.name: Usage
Usage.description:
## Installation
```shell
ember install ember-cli-debounce-query-params
```

## Looking for help?
If it is a bug [please open an issue on GitHub](https://github.com/BnitoBzh/ember-cli-debounce-query-params/issues).

Basic.name: Basic

Advanced.name: Advanced

DebounceQueryParamsMixin.name: DebounceQueryParamsMixin
DebounceQueryParamsMixin.description:
Inject this mixin in a route-driven controller in order to
be able to update query params with a debounce.

classitems.description:
Setup the controller for debouncing query param
  by calling `_setupDebounceQueryParams`
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: Update the underneath property hence the query param
classitems.name: _updateQueryParam

params.name: param
params.description: - the name of the property to update

params.name: value
params.description: - the new value of the property to update

classitems.description:
The default debounce name suffix

*__Example__ : `search` param will generate `debounceSearch` attribute*
classitems.name: _debounceParamNameSuffix

classitems.description: Return the original param name from the debounce param name
classitems.name: _debounceParamName

params.name: originalParamName
params.description: - the name of the property to update

classitems.description: Return the original param name from the debounce param name
classitems.name: _originalParamName

params.name: debounceParamName
params.description: - the name of the property to update

params.name: context
params.description: - the name of the property to update

params.name: debounceParamName
params.description:
- the name of the property to update
  in the format _debounceParamNameSuffix + ParamName

classitems.description:
Create an observer for each of the properties in debounceQueryParams
Note : Use setupController in route to force debounce param update
  when param is set derectly from the URI
classitems.name: _setupDebounceQueryParams

classitems.description: Check if the provided debounce param is an existing query param
classitems.name: _checkQueryParamsPresence

params.name: param
params.description: - the name of the original query param

warnings.message: replacing incorrect tag: returns with return
replacing incorrect tag: returns with return
